title: The Reality-Based Community
author: VD
content_html:
So, who wants to tell The New York Times that Oedipus is fiction, being a 2,451-year-old play written by Sophocles? It’s akin to writing an article about the problem of young men being able to fly and shoot lasers out of their eyes because you read a Superman comic.

DISCUSS ON SG
